subject: Vimeo: changing terms
text:
http://vimeo.com/terms

    MODIFICATION: This Agreement may not be modified except by a
    revised Terms of Service posted by Vimeo on the Vimeo Site or
    a written amendment signed by an authorized representative of
    Vimeo. A revised Terms of Service will be effective as of the
    date it is posted on the Vimeo Site.

The lack of details is baffling. But the "will be effective as of
the date it is posted" makes me deduce that it means:

 - at any time (i.e. without prior notice)
 - they don't have to notify you (just posting on the site)

This will be added to the sadly long list of terms doing this...
-- 
Hugo Roy, Project Lead
